name: Galactic Guardian (SmartFrog)
description:
Goal: The goal of the game is to control the spaceship and defeat all the enemies that appear on each level.

Controls: Use the WASD keys to steer the spaceship and the left mouse button to shoot. The W key moves the spaceship forward, the A key moves it left, the S key moves it backward, and the D key moves it right.

There is a minimap located in the corner of the screen that will help you navigate in space.

Level 1: In this level, you need to defeat three enemies. You need to shoot them down using your spaceship's weapons.

Level 2: In this level, you will fall into an asteroid belt and encounter five enemies.

Level 3: In this level, you will encounter a black hole from which many enemies will appear. New enemy stations will also attack your spaceship.

Level 4: In the last level, you will face new enemies, including dangerous attack aircraft that fire from three guns and follow your spaceship. Powerful elite fighters with increased viciousness hide behind the asteroid belt, so you need to use dexterity and strategy to win.

Points: You will earn points for each enemy you defeat. The more enemies you defeat, the more points you will earn.

Health: Your spaceship has a health bar, which will decrease if you get hit by an enemy's attack. If your health bar reaches zero, the game is over.

Enjoy the game: Finally, remember to enjoy the game and have fun controlling your spaceship and defeating the enemies!

My Modifications

  1. I've added a menacing new enemy to the game that resembles a space station. This enemy has the capability to shoot and pursue the player, adding an additional layer of difficulty and excitement to the game.
  2. To enhance the game's gameplay, I've also created a black hole from where enemies emerge. This dynamic obstacle ensures that players must be on the lookout for incoming threats while navigating through space.
  3. Additionally, I've added a scattering of asteroids throughout the game that provide hiding spots for enemies. Players must be cautious and observant as they progress through the levels to avoid ambushes.
  4. The final level now features a new and more treacherous enemy that fires from three guns while relentlessly pursuing the player. This enemy is sure to pose a challenge even for the most seasoned players.
  5. I've also updated the menu design.
  6. Finally, to help players navigate the game's increasingly complex and dynamic environments, I've added a minimap that makes it easier to locate enemies and plan their movements.
